amendment.description: To urge the international community to condemn the Palestinian terror attacks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2807 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Blumenthal. (consideration: CR S7955; text: CR S7955) To urge the international community to condemn the Palestinian terror attacks.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2807 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Blumenthal.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2807 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
